entry.title: RT Arthur Hayes: The Powell Pivot: "Slowing down is giving us, I think, a better sense of how much more we need to do, if we need to do more" But ever...
entry.summary: RT Arthur Hayes The Powell Pivot: "Slowing down is giving us, I think, a better sense of how much more we need to do, if we need to do more" But every measure of inflation is above the Fed target of 2%? Guess it's time to pump financial assets.

entry.title: RT Pentoshi 🐧 euroPeng 🇪🇺: A few thoughts about the state of the market leading into the $BTC ETF Everyone who wanted to sell, has done so. S...
entry.summary:
RT Pentoshi 🐧 euroPeng 🇪🇺 A few thoughts about the state of the market leading into the $BTC ETF Everyone who wanted to sell, has done so. Stable coins bottomed 3 months ago, and for the first time in 2 years we are actually seeing INFLOWS. Early stage reversal signs.
Pentoshi 🐧 euroPeng 🇪🇺: Pretty key update today as I've tracked this for some time Stable coin bleed stopped as discussed earlier in October, and has not made a new low now in over 3 months. It's even essentially had a very small uptick It could be a sign that capital is finally done exiting.…

entry.title: Re @ByzGeneral What makes you think it’s not getting sold back? If they sold it passively with limit orders into the wick, it wouldn’t show up on th...
entry.summary: Re @ByzGeneral What makes you think it’s not getting sold back? If they sold it passively with limit orders into the wick, it wouldn’t show up on the CVD as coming up or down. Actually it would look exactly like it does now if I’m not mistaken.

entry.title: Re @AlexOttaBTC If you look at how many shorts liquidated and became forced buyers, you’ll see that calculation doesn’t hold up. Overall do agree th...
entry.summary:
Re @AlexOttaBTC If you look at how many shorts liquidated and became forced buyers, you’ll see that calculation doesn’t hold up. Overall do agree that inflows will not have a 1:1 effect on marketcap. Check out this work from @_Checkmatey_ on this exact question https://twitter.com/_checkmatey_/status/1687323892388655105?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw
_Checkɱate 🔑⚡🌋☢️🛢️: One of the questions I am asked the most about #Bitcoin is how much capital needs to flow in/out in order to create a $1 change in Market Cap? There is no perfect answer, but I think I now have a pretty decent answer. Let's dive into the data 🧵 The Realized Cap This metric is…
